66626939-1d3a-492e-aa8e-481cda8a4cea.name: 健康
66626939-1d3a-492e-aa8e-481cda8a4cea.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

b85a177c-f50b-4171-829b-e8606bf76e58.name: 可选增益
b85a177c-f50b-4171-829b-e8606bf76e58.notes: 在天赋对应的技能检定失败后的避免遭受伤害的 HT 检定上获得加值

0fa74e85-b561-4ccd-9357-b39697bc5642.name: @罕见：加速度，高原反应，潜水病，晕船，或是太空病等@

06d597a2-827f-4489-aeca-067f98cd145b.name: @罕见：加速度，高原反应，潜水病，晕船，或是太空病等@

5903c6ac-a5cd-4e1e-a795-6ee15cf16225.name: 社会污名（少数群体）
5903c6ac-a5cd-4e1e-a795-6ee15cf16225.notes: -2 Reaction from others; +2 Reaction in own group

a4a46612-7926-4f51-b048-594c24cdb5b3.name: 减少基本速度
a4a46612-7926-4f51-b048-594c24cdb5b3.notes: Hold Basic Speed at 6.00. Decreased template's Basic Speed by [-5] using this.
